thread.title: AP Source: Offensive line coach Elliott to lead Gamecocks
thread.title_full: AP Source: Offensive line coach Elliott to lead Gamecocks

title: AP Source: Offensive line coach Elliott to lead Gamecocks
text:
AP Source: Offensive line coach Elliott to lead Gamecocks The Associated Press FILE - In this Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, file photo, South Carolina head coach Steve Spurrier, left, and LSU head coach Les Miles shake hands after an NCAA college football game in Baton Rouge, La. LSU won 45-24. Spurrier is retiring in the middle of his 11th season with South Carolina, sources confirmed. (AP Photo/Jonathan Bachman, File) By Pete Iacobelli, The Associated Press Oct. 13, 2015 8:44 a.m. (0) Comments 
COLUMBIA, S.C. (AP) - A person close to the situation says South Carolina co-offensive coordinator and offensive line coach Shawn Elliott will be the interim Gamecocks coach for the remainder of the season, replacing Steve Spurrier. 
A person says Spurrier told his team on Monday night that he was retiring, effectively immediately. The person spoke to The Associated Press on condition of anonymity because South Carolina has not publicly announced Spurrier's decision or who will be interim coach. 
Spurrier's weekly press conference is scheduled for noon EST on Tuesday. 
The Gamecocks are 2-4 and 0-4 in the Southeastern Conference for the first time in Spurrier's 23 seasons coaching in the league at Florida and South Carolina. 
Spurrier, in the middle of his 11th season at South Carolina, did not return messages seeking comment. Â© 2015 , Journal Sentinel Inc. All rights reserved.
